amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that the operator of Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) should consult with representatives of the community surrounding LAX regarding airport operations and expansion plans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 31 printed in House Report 112-46 to include sense of Congress language that the operator of Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) should consult with representatives of the community surrounding LAX regarding airport operations and expansion plans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A029) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A029) offered by Mr. Schiff.
